title: 09/30/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/30/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan PAtrick Show, DP talks to basketball Hall of Famer Ray Allen about how he'd go about fixing Ben Simmons' shot. He also tells us what the likelihood of a "He Got Game" Sequel is. Ole Miss Head Coach Lane Kiffin calls in to discuss his matchup with Alabama this weekend, and Dan asks him about his interest in the USC job. We also preview tonight's game between the Jags and Bengals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
